on reading compounds: 似我蜂【ジガバチ】red-banded sand wasp (Ammophila sabulosa), thread-waisted wasp (any wasp of family Sphecidae, incl. digger wasps and mud daubers)
酷似【コクジ】resembling closely, being strikingly similar, bearing a strong likeness
疑似【ギジ】pseudo, quasi, false, mock, sham, suspected (case)
kun reading compounds: 似る【にる】to resemble, to look like, to take after, to be similar (in status, condition, etc.), to be close, to be alike, to be like
